official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Federal Housing Finance Agency from reducing or limiting the multifamily housing
			 business of the Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home
			 Loan Mortgage Corporation.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
sponsor.#text: Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or as conservator or receiver of an
			 enterprise (as such term is defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1311 of the Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and
			 Soundness Act of 1992
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992/s:1311
Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992/s:1303

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, take any
			 action that has the effect of reducing or limiting the volume or scope of
			 the business of an enterprise in mortgages for multifamily housing unless—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992/s:1367

header.#text: Prohibition on reducing or limiting multifamily housing business of GSEs

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines that there is substantial evidence that such action is necessary to ensure
			 the financial safety and soundness of such enterprise;

text.#text: causes such determination to be published in the Federal Register; and
submits written notice of such determination to the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5495 IH: Preserving Multifamily Housing Act of 2014
